unnormalised: Tor, konnain tori Bharotantlem unch xikxonnak provex ghevnche vixim vicharlem, han? Tem thoddem jungle bhaxen asa, punn samballunk zatat. Poilem mhunnttlear, tumkam kiteak korunk zata tem tharoy – engineering? Med school? Arts? Tumchea 12vea classache marks khub mhotvache; mhunnttlear, 90+% marks mell'llear tumkam ek borem collegent provex mellonk xakta, punn IIT vo AIIMS bhaxilea ut'tom zageanchea khatir, tumkam entrance exams *khorench* bore bhaxen pass zavnk zai.
normalised: Haanv, konnani Bharotantlea uchch shikshonnachea provexa vixim vicharlem, mhunn? Thoddo jungle asa, punn samballunk zata. Poileach zannank, tumi kitem korunk sodhtat tem tharav – engineering? Med school? Kala? Tumchea barauea varganche gunn zaite mhotvache; zaitech, navvo plus tokke tumkam ek bori college mellounk xoktat, punn I-I-T vo A-I-I-M-S sarkhea unch zageank tumkam provexa porxa khub chokchokit korunk zai.

unnormalised: Exams vixim uloytana, JEE engineering-akhatir ek vhoddli exam. NEET medicos-anchea khatir khella-vantto asa. Dusrea courses-anchea khatir, choddxea universities-ancheo apleo provex porxa (CUET atam choddxea kendriy universities-anchea khatir) asatat vo tumchea 12vea markanchi nirdesht dhyan ghetat. Application forms sadharonnponni online astat, mhunn Feb-Marchchea vellar university-chea websites-acher dolli dovrat. Deadlines tight astat – te chuklear, tumchea khatir to voros beske zavnch gelo. Registration fees bodlotat punn sadharonnponni ₹500-₹2000 pori ek application-ak lagtat.
normalised: Porxanchi baat kortale, J-E-E engineeringakhatir ek vhoddli asa. N-E-E-T medicosakhatir khellacho ugddas asa. Dusrea courseakhatir, choddxea universitinchim aplich provexa porxa astat (C-U-E-T atam zaitea kendriya universitinkhatir) vo tumchea barauea gunnank nirdexit korun vichar kortat. Application forms sadharanponnim online astat, mhunnun February-Marchache aspas university websiteancher dollo thevat. Nirddharit tarikho tanntt astat – chukun gelle zalear, tumi tem vorsakhatir dubeit gelle mhunn samzonk zata. Nondnni moll unntta utarunk zata punn sadharanponnim rupiye panchxim te rupiye don hazar prottek applicationakhatir.

unnormalised: Hangasor ek pro tip asa: tumchea sogllea andde ekach tokrient dhavor naka. Annek colleges-ank application korat – komedi nhoi! Tumkam tumchea sopnnachea collegent (IIT Delhi, udahoronnak) reject korun xaktat, punn NIT Trichy bhaxilea kitem-torient mellonk xakta. Toxench reservation policies chek korat. Tum SC/ST/OBC astana, tumkam cutoffs-ant thodi suvort mellonk xakta, ji ek vhoddli faido zavnk xakta. Tumchea sogllea documents-ank hajir dovrat: 10vea ani 12vea mark sheets, caste certificate (zoruri zalear), Aadhaar card, photos, adi.
normalised: Hangasor ek pro tip: tumchea soglleam undde ekach daliyeant dovorunk naka. Zaitea collegeank apply karat – khorench! Tumkam tumchea sopnache collegentlean nirakar zata (I-I-T Delhi, dekhik), punn N-I-T Trichy sarkhea kitem tori mellounk ek bori sokya asta. Toxench, arakxonn nitionk tpasat. Tumi S-C slash S-T slash O-B-C zait zalear, tumkam cutoffant thoddi suit melltteli, ji ek vhodd faido zaunk xokta. Tumchi soglli kagadpotram hajir dovrat: davea ani barauea mark sheet, zaticho puravo (lagu zat zalear), Aadhaar card, photo, vagerea vagerea.

unnormalised: Counselling rounds mhotvache astat. Results bhair yetkoch, tumchea merit list-acher unch zagear astana tumkam counselling-achea khatir apoitole. Tumkam tumchi avoddichi colleges ani courses vinchun kaddunk poddtoli. Strategic zanv! Tumchea chances-anchea vixim kolpona mellovnk purnnea vorsanche cut off trends polleat. Ani counselling sessions-ank hajir zanv – te chukonaakat! Choddxea vellar, annek rounds astat, mhunn tumkam Round 1-ant tumchi poili pasand nasli tori, atunuy umed asa.
normalised: Salahache pherye mhotvache astat. Niyalk porinnamanchea bhair zalear, tumi merit listant unch aslear tumkam salahak ulo yetlo. Tumkam tumchea manovlelya collegeanche ani courseanche vinchnn korunk poddteli. Neeti-yukta ravat! Tumchea sondheancho ek vichar mellounk poileanchea vorsachea cutoff trendank polleat. Ani salahachea sessionank hajir ravat – tem choddonk naka! Dhondeaponnim, zaite phere astat, mhunnun tumkam tumchi poili pasand phero ekant mellonna zalearui, azunui axa asta.

unnormalised: Nimanne ponn mhottvachem, chintun naka. Unch xikxonnak provex ghevnchim ek marathon asa, sprint nhoi. Xenkddeanche students hea exams-ank hajir zatat. Tumchem research korat, borem toyar zanv, ani sakaratmak ravat. Ani yad dovrat, tumkam tumchea sopnnachea collegent zagear mellonasle tori, sadhi colleges, distance education, vo ghevnkhatir atunuy dusre upay astat, vo puchea prayatnankhatir bori toyari korun ek voros ghevnk xakat. Sogllea borem zaddum, bhav!
normalised: Nimannyak punn unnem nhõi, khub tanan zaunk naka. Uchch shikxonnache provex ek marathon astat, sprint nhõi. Hundreadem vidhyarthi hea porxak hajir zata. Tumchem sodh kortole, borebhaxen toyar zatole, ani sakaratmak ravtole. Ani ugddas dovrat, tumkam tumchea sopnache collegent dhondeaponnim provex mellona zalearui, duddvache college, durenxi shikxonn, vo puunn dusrea prayatnakhatir bori toyari korunk ek vors choddunkui zaite dusre vekulp astat. Soglle bore zaum, bhau!
